entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
